title: Remove Jax from Urf
body:
Riot have perma banned other champs from Urf, for being too over powered, and a bunch of my friends and I all agree that Jax needs to be added to this list. He has infinite gap closers, making it literally impossible to get away from him.  He has permanent dodge, making it impossible to kill him as an AA based champion. He permanently has his ult up giving him bonus resistances all the time, so he can just build full AP and one shot everyone. 

Every single game I have seen of URF with Jax in he has hard carried, gone something like 30/4 and is impossible to deal with. {{champion:24}} {{item:3146}}

replies.body: Syndra beats him, her E cooldown is shorter than his jump, so overall she can get away other than that shen can just block his autos forever, he doesn't need to be banned since he has counters, you just need to rely on the RNG gods to get what you need
That is two champs however, when he hard counters about 50% of the champs
